name: Custom Payload
author: scriptjunkie <scriptjunkie@scriptjunkie.us>
description:
Use custom string or file as payload. Set either PAYLOADFILE or
                PAYLOADSTR.
arch: x86, x86_64, x64, mips, mipsle, mipsbe, mips64, mips64le, ppc, ppce500v2, ppc64, ppc64le, cbea, cbea64, sparc, sparc64, armle, armbe, aarch64, cmd, php, java, ruby, dalvik, python, nodejs, firefox, zarch, r

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: PLATFORM
options.description: The platform that is being targeted

options.name: ARCH
options.description: The architecture that is being targeted

options.name: PAYLOADFILE
options.description: The file to read the payload from

options.name: PAYLOADSTR
options.description: The string to use as a payload
